propel.core.counters

Class SharedModuloCounter

  • java.lang.Object
    • propel.core.counters.ModuloCounter
      • propel.core.counters.SharedModuloCounter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICounter, IShared

    public final class SharedModuloCounter
extends ModuloCounter
implements IShared
    Thread-safe class using Monitors to provide modulo counter functionality. This class should be preferred over SharedModuloCounterLight for medium/high contention scenarios, as it does not use spin-waiting.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class propel.core.counters.ModuloCounter
